item.title: Vimtutor - Tutorial for newbie Vim user
item.description: Base On : VIM Tutor - Version 1.7 Copied version Install vimtutor on Fedora 35 : sudo dnf install vim-enhanced =============================================================================== = W e l c o m e t o t h e V I M T u t o r - Version 1.7 = =============================================================================== Vim is a very powerful editor that has many commands, too many to explain in a tutor such as this.
